grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 陣【ジン】battle formation, camp, encampment, position, group, gang, party, corps, war, battle, campaign
陣営【ジンエイ】camp (group of same ideological beliefs), faction (of political party), military camp, encampment, cantonment
布陣【フジン】battle formation, lineup (e.g. for a game)
出陣【シュツジン】going into battle, departure for the front
